title: Astral Priest

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are the *only* Partisan, no public announcement about the Partisans is made, and whispering, resigning, and modkills are enabled. This also applies if you are the last Partisan alive.
*- Yeah, the sun is cool and all, but don't you think it's really obvious that we exist if beams of light shine down from the fucking sun?*
- Constellations for a specific role appear when a player dies - a constellation for that player's role will appear in the sky for you.
- You may disguise your cause of death as any REF for free. You may disguise it as a Town only once per game.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Inspect the sky for an unknown constellation. A random role not in the game (rule 17 applies) will become a constellation. 2 uses.
- Harness the power of constellations. Use the ability of an active constellation's role on another player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Unite the Town under the... stars?
